title: When will studios start releasing their movies on a regular schedule again? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not sure how you missed the news but you’d better sit down - this is going to shock you. There’s a worldwide pandemic right and almost a million men, women, and children have died. Every nation on earth is desperately trying to find a solution - either a preventative or a cure or, even better, both. And you want to know when you can go to the movies…? I’d guess that would be sometime after people stop dying from COVID.
As soon as theaters are deemed by authorities, owners, operators, and the public as safe to attend again.
